document.full_text: president ali abdullah saleh said on friday he was ready to cede power to stop more bloodshed in yemen, but only to what he called "safe hands" as tens of thousands rallied against him in "day of departure" protests.
document.title: yemen's saleh says wants to put power in safe hands
lines_and_colors: president ali abdullah saleh said on friday he was ready to cede power to stop more bloodshed in yemen, but only to what he called "safe hands" as tens of thousands rallied against him in "day of departure" protests.
